description.name: usdcpolygon
description.tagline: USD Coin (Native) polygon Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto polygon-usdc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept USD Coin (Native) polygon directly on your website
Unique polygon/usdc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your polygon/usdc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
